rules.name: DG_complete_catch_up_call_ready
rules.label: DG complete / catch up call ready

decisions.description:
If the advice status is changed, we need to run the task and SLA checks.
If advice type is changed, we also need to close any orchestration tasks for the prior advice type. This should only be done where the deck status is not started since we reconfirm the advice type when deck is marked as completed by the planner.
decisions.name: StatusDecision
decisions.label: Status

Flow.description: Record triggered flow to automate actions for orchestrated advice.

formulas.description: Returns true if this is a new record.
formulas.name: isNew

formulas.description: The SLA type based on the former status of the advice.
formulas.name: slaTypeStatusEnd
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record__Prior.Advice_Status__c}, "Setup", {!STATUS_ADVICE_SETUP}, "Data gathering", {!STATUS_ADVICE_DATA_GATHERING}, "Risk Call", {!STATUS_ADVICE_DATA_ANALYSIS}, "Data analysis", {!STATUS_ADVICE_DATA_ANALYSIS}, "Suitability in progress", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PREPARE_ADVICE}, "Prepare advice", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PREPARE_ADVICE}, "Deck complete", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PRESENT_ADVICE}, "Present advice", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PRESENT_ADVICE}, "Await decision", {!STATUS_ADVICE_AWAIT_DECISION}, "In fulfilment", {!STATUS_ADVICE_IN_FULFILMENT}, "")

formulas.description: The SLA type based on the new status of the advice.
formulas.name: slaTypeStatusStart
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.Advice_Status__c}, "Setup", {!STATUS_ADVICE_SETUP}, "Data gathering", {!STATUS_ADVICE_DATA_GATHERING}, "Risk Call", {!STATUS_ADVICE_DATA_ANALYSIS}, "Data analysis", {!STATUS_ADVICE_DATA_ANALYSIS}, "Suitability in progress", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PREPARE_ADVICE}, "Prepare advice", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PREPARE_ADVICE}, "Deck complete", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PRESENT_ADVICE}, "Present advice", {!STATUS_ADVICE_PRESENT_ADVICE}, "Await decision", {!STATUS_ADVICE_AWAIT_DECISION}, "In fulfilment", {!STATUS_ADVICE_IN_FULFILMENT}, "")

Flow.label: Advice | Orchestration | Automation

variables.description: A list of the SLAs that we need to end (by updating the record with an end date/time).
variables.name: slaTypesEnd

variables.description: A list of the SLAs we need to start (by inserting SLA records against this advice).
variables.name: slaTypesStart
